title: Where can I check Strychnine content of Nuxvomica?
selftext:
Are there any laboratories in India where I can get the strychnine content of nuxvomica? If anyone has any leads or any information, that'd be really helpful

https://preview.redd.it/46br7b7qp2hb1.jpg?width=960&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=61e67cf962903b34e55b0ccaa36d94b00db38844
comments:
What exactly are your intentions? Because I don't see anything safe. 

NABL has a list of accredited testing laboratories.
